title: VedicBrahman.com
text:
VedicBrahman.com is an Indian <a href="Electronic%20Commerce">electronic commerce</a> <a href="Startup%20company">startup</a> which provides priests for <a href="Hindu">Hindu</a> <a href="Puja%20%28Hinduism%29">Puja</a> services. They currently offer services in 30 cities in <a href="India">India</a> and they also claim that in near future they will provide services in 16 cities outside of India. As per the media reports it is India's first online portal which provides Vedic priests of Varanasi.
As per <a href="Business%20Insider">BusinessInsider.com</a> the company has 70 Vedic Brahmins on board with them. As per Indian media reports, it is first of its kind of online religious services platform.
Services.
VedicBrahman.com provides priests to perform <a href="Sanskara%20%28rite%20of%20passage%29">Hindu rituals</a>. As per <a href="Economic%20Times%20%28India%29">Economic times</a> Vedicbrahman.com is targeting break even of the business by the end of 2017.
